verbs.description: [ARG0: Donald Trump 's] ability to [V: infuriate] [ARG1: many of the United States ' closest allies] is unrivaled among recent American presidents -- and yesterday , it got worse .
[ARG1: Donald Trump 's ability to infuriate many of the United States ' closest allies] [V: is] [ARG2: unrivaled] [ARGM-LOC: among recent American presidents] -- and yesterday , it got worse .
Donald Trump 's ability to infuriate many of the United States ' closest allies is unrivaled among recent American presidents -- and [ARGM-TMP: yesterday] , [ARG1: it] [V: got] [ARG2: worse] .
